mapper.insert: insert into s_log(login_name,user_no,opt_url,type,menu_no,state,ip_address,host_name,memo,opt_time,business_id) values((select login_name from s_user where user_no=#{user_no}),#{user_no},#{opt_url},#{type},#{menu_no},#{state},#{ip_address},#{host_name},#{memo},#{opt_time},#{business_id})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as row_num,a.* from (select l.loginlog_state,l.loginlog_timelimit,l.optlog_state,l.optlog_timelimit,l.errorlog_state,l.errorlog_timelimit,l.sendlog_state,l.sendlog_timelimit,u.user_name as last_opt_person,l.last_opt_time from sys_cfg_log l,s_user u where l.last_opt_person=u.user_no order by last_opt_time desc) a) where row_num=1
mapper.delete: delete from s_log where (sysdate-to_date(opt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')>#{loginlog_timelimit} and type='login') or (sysdate-to_date(opt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')>#{optlog_timelimit} and type='opt') or (sysdate-to_date(opt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')>#{errorlog_timelimit} and type='error')
